name: The Unkind Rewind - Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
name_original: The Unkind Rewind - Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
description:
The Unkind Rewind pits a lowly VHS rental store employee (YOU) against the clock to see how many VHS rental returns you can rewind in 60 seconds. Not all customers rewind before returning, so the tapes will take different times to rewind. Keep your 4 speed rewinders running at optimum performance to reach a HIGH SCORE! It is a crappy job, but at least you have some good music to listen to while you work.

Drag and Drop tape on the rewinders and click the rewinders when they turn green to eject the tape and open it for the next one.
